ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Wahoo!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just need to find something else to do while camping.  I ve read some very good books while sitting near the computer.  :) Should compile a list of spawn
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Worlord <worlord@...>
>
> I'm sorry people but for the TIME and EFFORT required for the Treant
> Fists they are not a good item.

Just need to find something else to do while camping. I've read some very
good books while sitting near the computer. :)

Should compile a list of spawn times and items gained for all classes, and
do some comparisons. Maybe we can get the stats changed a bit.
<moronically hopeful>

I still like them, if just for the AC, and the dark red color that matches
my surname so well. :)

- Raean Bloodyhands, 28th monk, sifu of the Fists of Fury, Tunare.
